definition[0]: if you crinkle part of your face, or if it crinkles, you move it so that small lines appear on it
example[0]: His mouth crinkled into a smile.
example[1]: He smiled boyishly, crinkling his eyes.
example[2]: Her face crinkled up in disgust.
definition[1]: to become covered with small folds, or make something do this
example[3]: The heat was beginning to make the cellophane crinkle.
definition[2]: a thin fold, especially in your skin or on cloth, paper etc
example[4]: The first crinkles of age were beginning to appear round her eyes.
